hints.content:
To find how many fewer pieces are $\green{\text{Finn's set}}$ than in $\purple{\text{Lena's set}}$, we need the difference, so we subtract.

$\purple{87} - \green{62} = \pink{\square}$

![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/656a5af3c268e82d7ea6366489a13e0d.png)

Or we can solve using addition:

$\green{62} + \pink{\Box} = \purple{87}$
Finn's set has $\pink{25}$ fewer pieces than Lena's set.

question.content:
Finn and Lena got new building sets.   Finn's set has $62$ pieces and Lena's set has $87$ pieces.

**How many fewer pieces does Finn's set have than Lena's?** 
 
[[☃ input-number 1]] fewer pieces

![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/dfc82f9b6d6f770b5b582580167662b3.png) ![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/5f2632cca65edfc58d03508ac5c39bfe.png)
